meanings.definition: To cover or envelop in mist.
meanings.sent1: The mountains were bemisting as the fog rolled in.
meanings.sent2: The forest was bemisting in the early morning haze.
meanings.sent3: The bemisting of the city made it look like a mysterious land.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts were bemisting her mind, clouding her judgment.
meanings.sent5: The artist painted a scene with skillful bemisting, creating an ethereal atmosphere.

meanings.definition: To become covered or enveloped in mist.
meanings.sent1: The valley was bemisting as the sun set behind the hills.
meanings.sent2: The garden was bemisting slowly as the evening dew settled.
meanings.sent3: The bemisting of the mirror made her reflection appear dreamy.
meanings.sent4: His memories were bemisting with nostalgia, blurring the lines of reality.
meanings.sent5: The old castle was bemisting in the moonlight, adding to its eerie charm.
